Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function.CalculationFunction

  • Packages that use CalculationFunction 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.config
    Configuration types for the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function
    Contains the interfaces implemented by functions that perform calculations in the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation
    Base package for calculation functions.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.credit
    Calculation functions for credit products.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.deposit
    Calculation functions for deposit products.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.fra
    Calculation functions for FRA products.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.future
    Calculation functions for futures products.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.fx
    Calculation functions for FX products.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.index
    Calculation functions for index products.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.payment
    Calculation functions for payment products.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.swap
    Calculation functions for swap products.

    • Uses of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config

      Classes in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config that implement CalculationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MissingConfigCalculationFunction
      Function used when there is no function registered that can calculate a requested value.

    • Uses of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function

      Subinterfaces of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CalculationMultiFunction<T extends CalculationTarget>
      A function that calculates multiple values for a target using multiple sets of market data.
      interface  CalculationSingleFunction<T extends CalculationTarget,R>
      A function that calculates a value for a target using multiple sets of market data.
      interface  CurrencyAwareCalculationMultiFunction<T extends CalculationTarget>
      A function that calculates multiple values for a target using multiple sets of market data.
      interface  CurrencyAwareCalculationSingleFunction<T extends CalculationTarget,R>
      A function that calculates currency values for a target using multiple sets of market data.

    • Uses of CalculationFunction in com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation

      Classes in com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation that implement CalculationFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCalculationFunction<T extends CalculationTarget,R>
      Abstract function calculating a result for each of a set of scenarios.
